entry.title: Shampoo | Forest Mint
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rocky Mountain Barber Company
Type:
Price: 85.00 - 1682.00 (9 variants)

Most shampoos contain powerful cleaning agents that can strip your client's hair and scalp of its natural oils. Repair your client's hair and scalp with our essential oil infused men's shampoo. Our shampoo is made using only the best ingredients like real eucalyptus, tea tree and peppermint essential oil and contains no artificial fragrance. Paraben, SLS & DEA-free. MSRP: $16.99.

Key Features: Eucalyptus Oil, Peppermint Oil & Tea Tree Oil. Paraben, SLS & DEA-free.

OVERVIEW

Repair Your Client's Scalp

Eucalyptus, Peppermint & Tea Tree essential oil contain properties to promote healthy hair and scalp health.

Contains Essential Oils With No Added Fragrance To Clean & Protect Your Client's Hair

Whether your client's hair is curly, thinning, or greying, a dry itchy scalp can lead to dandruff, flaking and damaged hair. Our shampoo is Paraben, DEA & Sodium Lauryl Sulfate free so it won't dry out your customer's hair and scalp. We use real essential oils, like Peppermint, Eucalyptus, and Tea Tree Oil to achieve our signature scent. 

Works on All Hair & Scalp Types

Whether your client's hair is long or short our shampoo penetrates to the roots to help promote healthier and better looking hair.

Crafted in Small Batches to Ensure Maximum Freshness and Quality

We take product quality very seriously, which is why we create our shampoo in small batches to ensure our products adhere to the highest level of quality. Our frequent production runs mean your customers receive quality shampoo that contains only the freshest ingredients.

PRO-TIPS
  • DIRECTIONS FOR BARBERS: For best results, apply to your clients' hair after a cut. At wash station, rinse clients' hair and create a gentle lather. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Pair with Rocky Mountain Barber Company's Hair Conditioner for best results. Style or comb as desired.
  • AT-HOME DIRECTIONS FOR YOUR CUSTOMERS: Dispense into hair then massage and rinse. Pair with Rocky Mountain Barber Company's Hair Conditioner for the ultimate Hair Care Routine. Style or comb as desired.
    SPECS
    • Dimensions: 13.5 cm x 5.8 cm x 5.8 cm
    • Volume: 237 ml
    INGREDIENTS
    • Water, Ammonium Lauryl Sulphate, Ammonium Laureth Sulphate, Cocomidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Glycerin, Polyquaternium 7, Phenoxyethanol, Ammonium chloride, Menthol, Cannabis Sativa (hemp seed) oil, Mentha Piperita ( Peppermint) Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus (Eucalyptus) Oil, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Citric Acid.

entry.title: Conditioner | Forest Mint
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rocky Mountain Barber Company
Type:
Price: 85.00 - 1682.00 (9 variants)

A great hair conditioner softens your clients' hair and further hydrates and protects it after shampooing. Repair your client's hair and scalp with our essential oil infused men's daily use conditioner. Our conditioner is made using only the best ingredients like real eucalyptus, tea tree and peppermint essential oil and contains no artificial fragrance. Paraben, SLS & DEA-free. MSRP: $16.99.

Key Features: Eucalyptus Oil, Peppermint Oil & Tea Tree Oil. Paraben, SLS & DEA-free.

OVERVIEW

Repair Your Client's Scalp

Eucalyptus, Peppermint & Tea Tree essential oil contain properties to promote healthy hair and scalp health.

Contains Essential Oils With No Added Fragrance To Hydrate & Protect Your Client's Hair

Whether your client's hair is curly, thin, oily, fine, or greying, an unhealthy scalp can lead to dandruff, flaking and damaged hair. Our conditioner is Paraben, DEA & Sodium Lauryl Sulfate free so it won't dry out your client's hair and scalp.

Works on All Hair & Scalp Types

Whether your client's hair is long or short, curly or straight, our conditioner penetrates to the roots to help promote healthier and better looking hair.

Crafted in Small Batches to Ensure Maximum Freshness and Quality

We take product quality very seriously, which is why we create our conditioner in small batches to ensure our products adhere to the highest level of quality. Our frequent production runs mean your customers receive a conditioner that contains only the freshest ingredients.

PRO-TIPS
  • DIRECTIONS FOR BARBERS: For best results, apply to your clients' hair after a cut. At wash station, apply to client's hair after shampooing to damp hair. Rinse thoroughly with warm water after 3 minutes. Style or comb as desired.
  • AT-HOME DIRECTIONS FOR YOUR CUSTOMERS: Apply after shampooing to damp hair. Rinse thoroughly with warm water after 3 minutes. Style or comb as desired.
    SPECS
    • Dimensions: 18.5 cm x 4.6 cm x 4.6 cm
    • Volume: 237 ml
    INGREDIENTS
    • Water, Cetyl Alcohol, Polyquaternium 7, Glycerin, Cetrimonium Chloride, Amodimethicone (and) Trideceth-12 (and) Cetrimonium Chloride, Steryl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Menthol, Cannabis Sativa (hemp seed) oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus (Eucalyptus) Oil, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid.
